meta.description: Determine which children the Lee family should take on a trip to minimize cost while satisfying various constraints.

sets.name: CHILDREN
sets.description: The children in the Lee family.

vars.name: take
vars.description: Binary variable indicating whether each child is taken on the trip.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of taking the children.

constraints.name: max_3_children
constraints.description: The couple can take a maximum of 3 children.

constraints.name: take_bob
constraints.description: Bob must be taken on the trip.

constraints.name: alice_diana_conflict
constraints.description: If Alice is taken, Diana cannot be taken and vice versa.

constraints.name: bob_charlie_conflict
constraints.description: If Bob is taken, Charlie cannot be taken and vice versa.

constraints.name: charlie_diana_dependency
constraints.description: If Charlie is taken, Diana must also be taken.

constraints.name: diana_ella_dependency
constraints.description: If Diana is taken, Ella must also be taken.

constraints.name: min_2_children
constraints.description: The couple must take at least two children.
